We Wonder Why Girls Are Bitchy Speshally Bout Us Guys, But Its Cos Of Dem Few Prats Dat Call Demselves Playaz And Hurt Girls That Us Normal Guys Cant Do Fuck All To Make Em Appy Agen Cos Of All Da Pain Deyve Had To Go Through, If Ur One Of Dese Guys, Givee It A Rest, On A Level R U A Demented Freak Dat Gets A Kick Out Of Hurting Sum1 Youve Said You Love Jus 4 A Bit Of Nosh, Try Sumit New Nd Be The Nice Guy You Find Out A Lot About A Girl, You Become There Friend And Then Maybe You Might See Where Im Cumin From, Jus Cos We Wanna Gf Dnt Give Us The Rite To Hurt All Them Innocent Girls Dat Do Nuffin But Try Nd Love Us Along The Way, Girls R Ppl Too, Showw Sum Respecttt =] Fankyew 4 Reading Please Leave A Message After The Tone.....

What I Would Do For My Girl x

girl:
I love you.

- Boy:
Yeah I know everyone does!

-Girl:
Really?

- Boy:
Yeah...everyone of my friends that are girls tell me that everyday.

- Girl:
Oh...but am I only your friend?

- Boy:
No...you're my girlfriend...why?

- Girl:
So when I say I love you I really do mean it.

- Boy:
Yeah I know you do mean it...its just that you dont need to tell me that you love me anymore cuz I know you love me since the day we been together and i love you more each and everyday.

- Girl:
......

- Boy:
So wanna go somewhere tonight for our 7th anniversary?

- Girl:
Yeah...where?

- Boy:
I dont know...maybe movie then dinner?

-Girl:
Ok.

- Boy:
Ill pick you up after I get off and get ready ok?

- Girl:
Ok. What time do you get off?

- Boy:
In 2 hours and then I gotta go home and yeah get ready which takes about 15-20 mintues...

-Girl:
hey...I thought you didnt have work today...

- Boy:
One of my co-workers called in sick.

- Girl:
Oh okay! So ill see you around 7:30 then?

- Boy:
Yeah! and babe?

- Girl:
Yeah?

- Boy:
I love you.

- Girl:
I love you too!

- Boy:
Ok my manager is like looking at me so yeah.... i gotta go.

- Girl:
Ok bye.

- Boy:
Bye.

****************************

2 hours later...

The guy drives to his girlfriends house and walks up to the door and rings bell.

- Girl:
Hey! (gives a kiss to her boyfriend)

- Boy:
Wassup...you ready?

- Girl:
Um...wait...let me get my bag and we can go ok?

- Boy:
Ok.

They both watched a movie and ate dinner...once they were done eating they head back to the car but before she got into the car...

- Boy:
Wait! Can I blind fold you?

- Girl:
Why??!

- Boy:
Its a suprise.

- Girl:
What kind of suprise?

- Boy:
A big one.

- Girl:
Okay but only if you promise me that you will hold my hand while we're driving.

- Boy:
I promise.

- Girl:
Ok blind fold me...

So they drove off...........and then they stoped.

- Boy:
Ok we're here!

-Girl:
Where?

- Boy:
Wait let me walk you to the place!

- Girl:
What place?

- Boy:
Somewhere! (and gives a kiss to her on the lips)

- Girl:
Baby!...

The boy walks her to the place.

- Boy:
Ok...let me take the blind fold off.

- Girl:
Where are we?

He takes it off her and she opens her eyes and sees the view of the city and at that same spot...that's where he first asked her to be his girlfriend....

- Girl:
Omg...(tears come down)

- Boy:
Why are you crying?

- Girl:
This is where you first asked me out...

- Boy:
What are you doing the rest of your life? (he asked on his knees and after he says that...behind him...in the air it says "Will you marry me?" in fireworks)

- Girl:
(tears come down faster)

- Boy:
I wasnt at work when you called me...I was planning this whole thing!

- Girl:
Get up!

- Boy:
Yeah?

- Girl:
(kisses him)

- Boy:
Is that a yes or a no?

- Girl:
Yes.

ORIGINALITY

Its Late Its Dark But Ive Things On My Mind
Early Hours Of The Morning With Words Yet To Find
Sitting And Thinking About Whats My Next Line
If I Don’t Get This Perfect Ill Start A New Rhyme

Its Been One Of Those Days Where I Don’t Have A Clue
But I Don’t Let It Show Cos I Spent It With You
At Least Ive Got One Thing I Know I Can Do
And That’s Be Your Best Friend Whilst Loving You Too

8Months Since The Last Song That Really Done Well
5Months Since I Found That I Tripped And I Fell
2Months Since You Took Over And Cast Your Love Spell
1Week Or 1Day I’ll Say How I Feel

Its Been Months Weeks And Days Since I Fell In Love
It Gets Harder Each Time I Leave With A Hug
And It Kills Me To Say That Were Nothing But Friends
But I Cannot Move On For Fear Of The End

I Hope Its Not Too Late To Say My True Feelings
I Hope I Don’t Fade Out Cos I Showed You No Meanings
I Hope That You Read This And Relate It To You
Cos Girl Your Amazing, And What I Feel Is True

Slipping Away..

Its Just Been An Hour But It Feels Like All Year
Cos Ur Going Away, And Theres Changes I Fear
Cos When U Get Back U'll Make A Choice Dear
To Go Str8 To Your Boyfriends Or To Sum1 Thats Near

I Dont Want To Make It Out Like Its One Or The Other
I Just Dont Think Were The Same Since Uve Been Together
If We Went Back To Normal Thered Be No Dilemna
But I Cant See It Happening While Were In Stormy Weather

You Might Think Im One Of These Guys, Nice At The Start
But I Need To Show You That You Took My Heart
Ive Had Loadsa Offers But There Just Not Like You
And Even Though Were Just Friends Its Like Cheating On You

Cos Thats How I Feel When I Gaze In Ur Eyes
And When You Smile At ME U Lift Up My Life
Theres Been Backstabbing Friends In Both Of Our Lives
But The Only Stabbing Hear Is When I Jump In Front Of That Knife

I Mean What I Say In The Lyrics I Write
Cos When Im Tucked Up In Bed And Its Late At Night
The Only Thing I Think Of Is Holding You Tight
And I Cant Live Without You, But It Hurts That I Might..

Anuva Song (Y)

i guess its one of them fings
u take the good with the bad
when ur her best friend
but loved ones make her sad

when she's all that u care for and she's sittin nd cries
u give her that hug but the inside you dies
cos u realise ur just hugging a friend
instead of sum1 ur with from beggining to end

i'll tell her one day that i feel her same pain
when sum1 whos close just brings tears like rain
its not that im begging for them to split up
i just dont want to see her heaet get all cut up

i know you might read this and things myt just change
but i just felt the need to say the things on my brain
and when ur in the cold and im not by ur side
just know that i love u nd theres no need to hide..

he left her to be found

He left her alone without a care in the world
He left her with no one to hug or to hold
He left her at home while she just sat and cried
He left her heartbroken and didn’t even try

Her best friend was there and he tried to make sense
But whatever he said made no difference
Because she isn’t crying cos of what he did
She’s crying cos she knows what she might of missed

A boy with a smile to cheer her up when she’s down
A boy who would leave work just to stop that 1 frown
That boy is her best friend and she cries when he leaves
Cos her boyfriend wont do that he’ll just do what he please

And she must know he likes her but is scared to speak out
And he thinks that she likes him but is riddled with doubt
And whenever he leaves her he says under his breath
Im in love with you from now until death

They both love each other it’s a kind of sad tale
But when she gets this close she gets hurt by those males
That just want one thing so she’s scared he’s the same

But deep down she knows that he’s not
She knows he’s the one
And in his heart of hearts he knows he has fallen
He knows what he’s done

Maybe if he had of told her from the very start
Then they’d both be together
There’d be no broken heart
But whats done is done and we must not regret
That when she comes back he’ll have no more regret

This Is Out To All Who Cheat. Boys And Girls

TO THE CHEATS

THIS IS TO THE PLAYES THE LIERS AND CHEATS
THIS IS JUST TO TELL YOU THAT UR NOT WORTH THE BEATS
THIS IS JUST A WARNING TO SAY STOP ALL THEIR HURT
DON’T LEAVE THE ONE U SAY U LOVE LYING IN THE DIRT

THEY MAY NOT LET IT SHOW BUT IT HURTS THEM INSIDE
THEY MAY STILL GO AND JAM WITH YOU WHEN THEY JUST WANT TO HIDE
THEY MAY TELL YOU THAT THEY ARE FINE BUT ITS JUST ALL AN ACT
COS UR THE ONE WHO BROKE THEIR HEART BE A MAN AND FACE THE FACTS

THE FONE CALLS U GAVE THEM THE WORDS YOU WOULD SAY
THE WAY JUST ONE TEXT WOULD BRIGHTEN THEIR DAY
DID IT MAKE U FEEL BIG TO HAVE YOUR GIRFRIEND AS WELL
COS I FINK UR PATHETIC UR WORSE THEN BAD SMELL

THE LIES AND THE CHEATING THE PATHETIC EXCUSE
THE PHYSICALL BLACKMAIL AND EMOTIONAL ABUSE
THE PAIN THAT U CAUSED EM JUST MADE THEM THEIR BEST
HOW DOES IT FEEL UR NOW JUST LIKE THE REST

EVERY PARTNER THAT THEY’VE HAD IN THEIR LIFE
UR IN THE CATEGORY THAT THEY AIM WITH A KNIFE
THERE NOT GNA HURT U THEY’LL NOw SHOW U THIS
UVE JUST LOST THE BEST THING THAT YOU’LL MISS

Signs

they show u the feelings just like your there partner
they show u the things that make it just harder
to move on when they say those same few words
i didnt mean to lead you on. IM SICK OF IT FROM BIRDS

the day that i love you has now been and gone
the day that i used to write you a song
the day that i may have quit work just to see
its not the same day since the day u left me

u told me things and made a big issue
but im not going home just to cry in some tissue
cos im stronger then that and i admit i did love you
but now i'll move on and its better for us two

we'll still see each other but now that theres him
the time that we spend just goes by cos its thin
the laughter and jokes dont seem to appear
cos i seem to be waiting to just dissapear

All of You Girls That Fink Boiz R Pricks
And to All Of You Boys That Think With Your dicks
Just Make A Commitment To Urself And Just Listen
The Day U Stop Lying Is The Day That You'll Glisten

Just End It

I’m fed up of these dreams
I’m fed up of these lies
I’m fed of the way
I’m living my life

In the start it was all just a memory
Words don’t explain what u meant to me
Ill move on with time yes eventually
It’ll be me on my own no lives to lead

When I found out that u was with him
It cut me apart like you've never seen
Cos I wanted to be there in my life
Thru the good and the bad, no more pain in my life

But u didn’t see what u meant to me
You couldn’t see what I could believe
That me and u were meant to be
But now its u2 not you and me

The time goes slow round his yard
And it just feels like were worlds apart
Cos I wanted to ring u but in the end
I want u to pick up as my girlfriend

I don’t think this life is the one I’d choose
If I could go back, I feel I’m just being abused
Cos I showed u my world and what i've been through
And now it’s all gone I feel i’ve been used

I know u didn’t mean it but the feelings there
When I used to come round just while u str8en your hair
And I no to you that nothing's changed
But the way we are is just all deranged

Life’s shit when it changes everyone knows
You grow up lose friends and have a change in clothes
But one thing will stay there for the rest of my life
You hurt me babe, now pick up that knife
And end it…....

Hmmm...

Just Had A Convo With My Best Mate (also The Girl I Rle Rle RLE like :]) and apparently theres no such thing as a nice guy and i told her that maybe she should give some of us a chance. what can i DO to make her realise? any help wd be appreciated

I'm Sorry

Girls dont realize these things
I'm Sorry

Actually read this its so true

I'm sorry
that I bought you roses
to tell you that i like you

I'm sorry
That I was raised with respect
not to sleep with you when you were drunk

I'm sorry
That my body's not ripped enough
to "satisfy" your wants

I'm sorry
that I open your car door,
and pull out your chair like I was raised

I'm sorry
That I'm not cute enough
to be "your guy"

I'm sorry
That I am actually nice;
not a jerk

I'm sorry
I don't have a huge bank account
to buy you expensive things

I'm sorry
I like to spend quality nights at home
cuddling with you, instead of at a club

I'm sorry
I would rather make love to you then just screw you
like some random guy.

I'm sorry
That I am always the one you need to talk to,
but never good enough to date

I'm sorry
That I always held your hair back when you threw up,and didn't get mad at you for puking in my car,
but when we went out you went home with another guy

I'm sorry
That I am there to pick you up at 4am when your new man hit you and dropped you off in the middle of nowhere,
but not good enough to listen to me when I need a friend

I'm sorry
If I start not being there because it hurts being used as a door mat, only to be thrown to the side when the new jerk comes around

I'm sorry
If I don't answer my phone anymore when you call, to listen to you cry for hours, instead of getting a couple hours of sleep before work

I'm sorry
that you can't realize.. I've been the one all along.

I'm sorry
If you read this and know somebody like this
but don't care

But most of all

I'm sorry
For not being sorry anymore

I'm sorry
That you can't accept me for who I am

I'm sorry
I can never do anything right, and nothing that I do is good
enough to make it in your world.

I'm sorry
I caught your boyfriend with another girl and told you about it, I thought that was what friends were for...

I'm sorry
That I told you I loved you and actually meant it.

I'm sorry
That I talked to you for nine hours on Thanksgiving when your boyfriend was threatening you instead of spending time with my family.

I'm Sorry
That I cared

I'm sorry
that I listen to you at night talking about how you wish you could have done something different.

Ladies always complain and gripe to their friends that there is never any good guys out there, and they always end up with assholes who mistreat them. Well ladies next time you're complaining, maybe look up to see who you're complaining to, maybe that special someone is right there hanging on your every word as usual, screaming in his head "Why won't you give me a chance?"
Because the person you are usually searching for is right by you.

If you're a guy and you agree with this letter, repost as "I'm sorry "

If You're one of the FEW girls with enough BALLS to repost, and you would never make your guy feel this way, repost as Subject "Girls dont realize these things"

To All You Girls

Can Anyone Tell Me Why You Lot Never Go 4 The Gd Guy Even When Every1 Can See That He's The Right One For You?

U Dnt Have A Clue

Theres A Girl Im In Love With
She Dont Have A Clue
Her Names Not Important
You'll Know If Its You
The Times That We Have
To The Fone Calls And Chats
The Feelings U Give Me
Are The Feelings I Hide
I Know That I Would Treat You Right
I Just Cant Find My Voice
To Let You Know One Perfect Night
Ive Decided To Make A Choice
To Risk My Friendship With My Best Friend
To Risk So Much Fun And Joy
To Tell You Your The One I Love
To Be More In The End
I Know Your Happy With Him For Now
But How Long Will It Last
No Pressure Babe Its Your Choice Now
But I Need To Know, And Fast

xxx

Its Not Me

Its Not Me That Waits Outside Your Door
Its Not Me Who You See Everyday Anymore
Its Not Me That Phones You Up To Say
How Are You Babe, I’ll Be Up Right Away

Its Not Me Who Spends All Day With You
Its Not Me Who Sits On Your Bed And Laughs
Its Not Me That Walks You Home At Night
Its Not Me Anymore Because Something’s Not Right

Its Now Him That You Want Me To Change Into
Its Not Me That’s Your Best Friend I Wish It Weren’t True
I’ve Been Replaced Because He Got To You First
Its Not Me That Takes You Out And Ends Your Thirst

Its Not Me That You Want Your Phone To Say
How Are You Babe And How Was Your Day
But It Is Me That You’ve Pushed Away
Its Not Me Anymore And It Needs To Change

So When I Seem Moody Like I Don’t Want To Be Here
Im Just Letting You Know So I Made It Clear
Its Not Me That Will Show You The Pain That’s Inside
It’s The Heart That’s Involved That You Will See Cry
